name: HappyLittlePainter
description:
Instructions:

- Leap Motion device is required
- Enable [x] Tools Tracking from Leap Motion Control Panel
- Draw to canvas with your tool, select colors from palette

Whats new: V1.2 (28.11.2015)
- Added: Closeup camera for brush
- Fixed: Don't play brush sound on canvas if not moving

Whats new: V1.1 (15.11.2015)
- Added: Submit to OnlineGallery button (opens default browser to view the image, after image has been submitted)
- Fixed: Color got resetted if brush goes out of view
- Fixed: Couldnt clear image, if brush went outside of view, until drew again

Online Gallery:
http://games.unitycoder.com/hlp/index.php

More info, reporting bugs & feature requests:
